availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and notary public. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Bulkley Fishback. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860. Captain of the 1st Kentucky Cavalry (Co. L). Notary public in Garrard County in 1864.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 62; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 5, p. 240; Find A Grave, "Capt. John Brent Fishback (1841-1920)," Memorial #14985996, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=14985996&ref=acom (accessed March 16, 2017).
